title: Tessa Thompson gets heads turning in fiery red coat with matching trousers
text:
Tessa Thompson was looking red hot on Tuesday.

Rocking a fiery coat, matching button up shirt, and poofy pair of trousers, there was no missing the actress as she headed to Good Morning America in New York City.

The Lady And The Tramp actress, 36, completed the look with a small hand bag.

No missing her! Tessa Thompson was decked out in head-to-toe red as she headed to Good Morning America in New York on Tuesday

In addition to her fiery suit, she stood tall in a dazzling pair of fire engine red heels.

She wore her tresses slicked back, accentuating her radiant complexion with an elegant coat of makeup.

She wore a burgundy hued shade of lipstick along with a dab of eye shadow around her lids.

The only accessory she wore which diverged from the all-red theme were her chunky gold earrings.

Red-y for fall! Thompson even carried a matching red hand bag and wore coordinating heels

Coming soon: Tessa will be back on the big screen soon, lending her voice to the titular pooch in the upcoming live action adaptation of Lady And The Tramp

Tessa will be back on the big screen soon, lending her voice to the titular pooch in the upcoming live action adaptation of Lady And The Tramp.

The film, based on the 1955 animated film about two dogs who fall in love, also features the voice of Justin Theroux as Tramp.

'We're not changing, we're not modernizing, we're not super updating,' Justin told ET Online of the film. 'It's just a different way of telling a wonderful story.'

Hello gorgeous! She wore a burgundy hued shade of lipstick along with a dab of eye shadow around her lids

The Disney movie is set for release on November 12, 2019.

The daughter of singer-songwriter Marc Anthony Thompson, Tessa's credits include roles in Westworld, Avengers: Endgame, Men In Black: International, and Dear White People.

She is set to return to her role of Valkyrie in the upcoming 2021 film, Thor: Love And Thunder.
